channel.title: David Dellago on News
channel.description: Recent content in David Dellago on News

item.title: New Mexico Hospital Battles Addiction with Health Information Technology Apps
item.description: McKinley County, New Mexico, is the namesake of the assassinated 25 U.S. President William McKinley. Many locals, particularly those Native Americans of Navajo decent living on reservations, have also been the victim of assassination, but in character in addition to physical attacks. Three decades ago Gallup, New Mexico, which borders on the Navajo Reservation, was known as “Drunk Town, USA.” For many years Northwest New Mexico’s Gallup ranked number one nationally in the number of alcohol-related deaths.
